"The Mouse Who Was Stuck In A Shoe" - An interactive story where the mouse has to escape from a shoe, and the audience must help him by solving puzzles and riddles.
"The Mouse Who Found A New Home" - A heartwarming tale about a mouse who discovers a new home after living in a shoe, and the adventures he goes on to explore his new surroundings.
"The Mouse Who Learned To Be Brave" - A story about a mouse who must overcome his fear of shoes to a problem, and the problem.
"The Mouse Who Learned To Cook" - A story about aling mouse who learns to cook delicious meals in a shoe, and the audience can learn to cook the same meals at home.
"The Mouse Who Learned To Read" - A story about aling mouse who learns to read in a shoe, and the audience can learn to read in a shoe as well.
